name_en: Krishak Bandhu Scheme - West Bengal
description_en: West Bengal's flagship scheme providing Rs. 10,000 per acre per year (in two installments) as farm income support to all farmers with land. Also includes a death benefit of Rs. 2 lakh for farmers aged 18-60 years.
description_hi: पश्चिम बंगाल की प्रमुख योजना जो सभी कृषकों को प्रति वर्ष प्रति एकड़ 10,000 रुपये (दो किश्तों में) फसल सहायता देती है। 18-60 वर्ष के किसानों को 2 लाख रुपये मृत्यु लाभ भी मिलता है।
benefit_amount: Rs. 10,000 per acre per year + Rs. 2 lakh death benefit
how_to_apply: Apply at local Krishak Bandhu Help Centre or Block Agriculture Office. Registration via krishakbandhu.net portal. Benefit transferred directly to bank account.

name_en: KALIA Scheme (Krushak Assistance for Livelihood and Income Augmentation) - Odisha
name_hi: कालिया योजना (कृषक सहायता आजीविका और आय संवर्धन) - ओडिशा
description_en: Odisha's comprehensive scheme providing financial support for cultivation and allied activities. Rs. 25,000 per family for kharif and rabi seasons (Rs. 5,000 per season x 5 crops), livelihood support of Rs. 12,500 for landless agricultural households, assistance for vulnerable farmers and interest-free crop loans.
description_hi: ओडिशा की व्यापक योजना जो खेती और संबद्ध गतिविधियों के लिए वित्तीय सहायता प्रदान करती है। प्रति परिवार 25,000 रुपये (खरीफ और रबी सीजन के लिए 5,000 रुपये प्रति सीजन x 5 फसलें)।
benefit_amount: Rs. 25,000 per family per year; Rs. 12,500 for landless farmers
how_to_apply: Register on kalia.odisha.gov.in or visit nearest CSC. Verification done by local agriculture department. Benefit directly credited to Aadhaar-linked bank account.

name_en: Rajiv Gandhi Kisan Nyay Yojana - Chhattisgarh
name_hi: राजीव गांधी किसान न्याय योजना - छत्तीसगढ़
description_en: Chhattisgarh's direct income support scheme providing Rs. 9,000 per acre per year to paddy farmers and Rs. 13,000 to other crops (maize, kodo, kutki, soybean, arahar, ganne) in four installments. Covers landless agricultural labourers too.
description_hi: छत्तीसगढ़ की प्रत्यक्ष आय सहायता योजना। धान किसानों को प्रति एकड़ प्रति वर्ष 9,000 रुपये और अन्य फसलों पर 13,000 रुपये चार किश्तों में।
benefit_amount: Rs. 9,000 per acre (paddy); Rs. 13,000 per acre (other crops) per year
how_to_apply: Register through village Patwari or online at rgkny.cg.nic.in. Submit crop sowing declaration. Benefit in four annual installments to bank account.

name_en: Mukhyamantri Krishi Ashirwad Yojana - Jharkhand
description_en: Jharkhand's income support scheme for small and marginal farmers with up to 5 acres of land. Provides Rs. 5,000 per acre per year for kharif season (maximum Rs. 25,000 per farmer). Benefit directly transferred to bank account.
description_hi: झारखंड की आय सहायता योजना। 5 एकड़ तक की भूमि वाले छोटे और सीमांत किसानों को खरीफ सीजन के लिए प्रति एकड़ 5,000 रुपये (अधिकतम 25,000 रुपये)।
benefit_amount: Rs. 5,000 per acre per kharif season (max Rs. 25,000)
how_to_apply: Register through Block Agriculture Office or Common Service Centre (CSC). Aadhaar seeding with bank account is mandatory for DBT.

name_en: Meri Fasal Mera Byora - Haryana
description_en: Haryana's integrated portal for crop registration to ensure farmers get benefited from various government schemes, sale on MSP, and natural disaster compensation. Mandatory registration for selling at procurement centres. Covers all crops.
description_hi: हरियाणा का एकीकृत फसल पंजीकरण पोर्टल। MSP पर बिक्री और प्राकृतिक आपदा मुआवजे के लिए पंजीकरण अनिवार्य।
benefit_amount: MSP price for crops + natural disaster compensation
how_to_apply: Register on fasal.haryana.gov.in or at nearest Atal Sewa Kendra. Upload crop details, land records, and bank account. Required for all procurement schemes.

name_en: Bhavantar Bharpai Yojana - Haryana
description_en: Price deficiency payment scheme for vegetable and fruit growers in Haryana. If market price falls below Protected Price (PP) fixed by government for 21 notified crops, the difference is compensated directly to farmer's bank account.
description_hi: हरियाणा में सब्जी और फल उत्पादकों के लिए मूल्य क्षतिपूर्ति योजना। 21 अधिसूचित फसलों के लिए सरकार द्वारा निर्धारित संरक्षित मूल्य से बाजार मूल्य कम होने पर अंतर की भरपाई।
benefit_amount: Difference between Protected Price and market price per quintal
how_to_apply: Register on Meri Fasal Mera Byora portal first. Enroll in Bhavantar Bharpai at hortharyana.gov.in or local Horticulture Department. Sell through registered mandis.

name_en: Raitha Siri (Farmer Prosperity) - Karnataka
description_en: Karnataka's comprehensive farmer welfare scheme providing crop loss compensation, free crop insurance, interest-free loans up to Rs. 3 lakh, and direct income support of Rs. 2,000 per year to all registered farmers. Also covers power subsidy for irrigation pumps.
description_hi: कर्नाटक की व्यापक किसान कल्याण योजना। फसल नुकसान मुआवजा, मुफ्त फसल बीमा, 3 लाख तक ब्याज मुक्त ऋण और पंजीकृत किसानों को 2,000 रुपये प्रतिवर्ष।
benefit_amount: Rs. 2,000 annual support + interest-free loan up to Rs. 3 lakh
how_to_apply: Apply at Raitha Samparka Kendra (RSK) or online at raitamitra.karnataka.gov.in. Registration through Bhoomi Karnataka portal linked with Aadhaar.

name_en: Krishi Bhagya Scheme - Karnataka
description_en: Karnataka scheme for dryland farmers providing subsidy for farm ponds, polyhouse, sprinkler/drip irrigation, farm machinery, and water harvesting structures. 80% subsidy for SC/ST and 75% for others. Helps reduce dependence on monsoon.
description_hi: सूखी भूमि के किसानों के लिए कर्नाटक योजना। खेत तालाब, पॉलीहाउस, ड्रिप/स्प्रिंकलर सिंचाई, कृषि मशीनरी और जल संरक्षण पर 80% (SC/ST) और 75% (अन्य) सब्सिडी।
benefit_amount: 75-80% subsidy on farm pond and irrigation infrastructure
how_to_apply: Apply at nearest Raitha Samparka Kendra (RSK). Site inspection by agriculture officer. Subsidy released after work completion verification.

name_en: CM Samagra Gramya Unnayan Yojana (CMSGUY) - Assam
name_hi: मुख्यमंत्री समग्र ग्राम्य उन्नयन योजना - असम
description_en: Assam's integrated rural development scheme combining agriculture, horticulture, fisheries, and animal husbandry support. Provides seed, fertilizer and input subsidy of up to Rs. 15,000 per year, along with training and technical support for 26 lakh farmer families.
description_hi: असम की एकीकृत ग्रामीण विकास योजना। कृषि, बागवानी, मत्स्य पालन और पशुपालन सहायता। 26 लाख किसान परिवारों को प्रतिवर्ष 15,000 रुपये तक बीज, खाद और इनपुट सब्सिडी।
benefit_amount: Up to Rs. 15,000 per year in farm inputs and subsidized equipment
how_to_apply: Contact Block Agriculture Officer or village-level agriculture worker (Krishi Sakhi/Krishi Mitra). Registration through Assam Agriculture Department portal.

name_en: Mukhyamantri Kheti Sanrakshan Yojana - Himachal Pradesh
name_hi: मुख्यमंत्री खेती संरक्षण योजना - हिमाचल प्रदेश
description_en: Himachal Pradesh scheme providing 85% subsidy on anti-hail nets, fencing, and protective infrastructure to protect crops from wildlife menace, hailstorms, and natural calamities. Covers apple, vegetable and other horticultural crops predominantly.
description_hi: हिमाचल प्रदेश योजना। ओलावृष्टि रोधी जाल, बाड़ लगाने और सुरक्षात्मक ढांचे पर 85% सब्सिडी। जंगली जानवरों और प्राकृतिक आपदाओं से फसल सुरक्षा।
benefit_amount: 85% subsidy on anti-hail nets and protective fencing
how_to_apply: Apply at District Agriculture / Horticulture Office. Submit land details and crop information. Inspection by Horticulture Development Officer before release.

name_en: Mukhyamantri Krishak Khushhali Yojana - Bihar
description_en: Bihar's scheme for small and marginal farmers providing input cost subsidy of Rs. 13,500 per hectare (irrigated) and Rs. 6,800 per hectare (unirrigated) for crop losses due to floods, droughts, or disease. Covers kharif crops mostly.
description_hi: बिहार की छोटे और सीमांत किसानों के लिए योजना। बाढ़, सूखे या बीमारी से फसल नुकसान पर सिंचित भूमि के लिए 13,500 रुपये/हेक्टेयर और असिंचित भूमि के लिए 6,800 रुपये/हेक्टेयर।
benefit_amount: Rs. 13,500/ha (irrigated) and Rs. 6,800/ha (unirrigated) crop loss compensation
how_to_apply: Register on DBT Agriculture Bihar portal at dbtagriculture.bihar.gov.in. Apply during crop loss notification period. Verification by Panchayat Sevak.

name_en: Karshaka Snehi (Farmer Friendly) Scheme - Kerala
description_en: Kerala government's interest subvention scheme providing 0% interest loans up to Rs. 1 lakh to rice farmers and vegetable farmers through primary cooperative banks. Crop loan repaid within one year gets interest waiver. Also includes Rs. 2,000 annual assistance for paddy cultivation.
description_hi: केरल सरकार की ब्याज सब्सिडी योजना। धान और सब्जी किसानों को प्राथमिक सहकारी बैंकों के माध्यम से 1 लाख तक 0% ब्याज ऋण। धान खेती के लिए 2,000 रुपये वार्षिक सहायता।
benefit_amount: 0% interest crop loan up to Rs. 1 lakh + Rs. 2,000 annual grant
how_to_apply: Apply through Primary Agricultural Credit Societies (PACS) or KASARAGOD-based cooperative banks. Submit crop details and land records.

name_en: Chief Minister's Solar Powered Green House Scheme - Tamil Nadu
name_hi: मुख्यमंत्री सौर ऊर्जा संचालित ग्रीनहाउस योजना - तमिलनाडु
description_en: Tamil Nadu scheme providing 40% subsidy (50% for SC/ST) on polyhouse and shade net house construction with solar-powered drip irrigation. Promotes off-season vegetable production and floriculture. Maximum subsidy of Rs. 1.12 lakh per unit.
description_hi: तमिलनाडु योजना। सौर ऊर्जा चालित ड्रिप सिंचाई के साथ पॉलीहाउस और शेड नेट हाउस निर्माण पर 40% सब्सिडी (SC/ST के लिए 50%)। अधिकतम 1.12 लाख रुपये प्रति यूनिट।
benefit_amount: 40-50% subsidy on polyhouse construction max Rs. 1.12 lakh
how_to_apply: Apply at District Horticulture Officer (DHO) office. Submit site plan and estimate. Empanelled contractors list available at DHO office. Subsidy released after inspection.

name_en: Uzhavar Sandhai (Farmers Market) - Tamil Nadu
description_en: Tamil Nadu government's direct marketing platform where farmers sell vegetables, fruits, and agricultural produce directly to consumers without middlemen. Over 206 Uzhavar Sandhai markets across Tamil Nadu. Farmers get 20-30% higher price, consumers get 15-20% lower price.
description_hi: तमिलनाडु सरकार का प्रत्यक्ष विपणन मंच। किसान बिचौलियों के बिना सीधे उपभोक्ताओं को बेचते हैं। किसानों को 20-30% अधिक कीमत, उपभोक्ताओं को 15-20% कम कीमत।
benefit_amount: 20-30% better price realization for farmers
how_to_apply: Contact nearest Agricultural Marketing Information Cell. Register as vendor at local Uzhavar Sandhai. Stall allotment by Agriculture Department.

name_en: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Kisan Samridhi Sah-Yojana (PM-MKSSY)
ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying
description_en: Formalization of the unorganized fisheries sector. Provides institutional credit, crop insurance for fisheries, performance grants and incentives for micro and small enterprises. Covers fish farmers, fish workers, fish vendors. Total outlay: Rs. 6,000 crore over 4 years.
description_hi: असंगठित मत्स्य पालन क्षेत्र का औपचारिकीकरण। मत्स्य किसानों, मजदूरों और विक्रेताओं को संस्थागत ऋण, फसल बीमा, प्रदर्शन अनुदान। 4 वर्षों में 6,000 करोड़ रुपये।
benefit_amount: Subsidized insurance + credit + performance grants for fisheries
how_to_apply: Register at nearest District Fisheries Officer or on pmmsy.dof.gov.in. Registration of fishing vessel / fish pond mandatory. Enroll for fisheries insurance and credit linkage.

name_en: Blue Revolution (Neeli Kranti) - Fisheries Scheme
ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying
description_en: Central scheme for integrated development and management of fisheries. Supports inland fisheries, aquaculture, mariculture, deep sea fishing, post-harvest infrastructure, and exports. Provides 40-60% subsidy on fish seed production, ponds, boats, nets, and cold chain infrastructure.
description_hi: मत्स्य पालन के एकीकृत विकास के लिए केंद्रीय योजना। अंतर्देशीय मत्स्य पालन, जलीय कृषि, गहरे समुद्र में मछली पकड़ना, पोस्ट-हार्वेस्ट बुनियादी ढांचे पर 40-60% सब्सिडी।
benefit_amount: 40-60% subsidy on fishery infrastructure and equipment
how_to_apply: Apply through State Fisheries Department or District Fisheries Officer. Project proposal required for infrastructure subsidy. Individual applications for equipment subsidy.

name_en: Pradhan Mantri Formalisation of Micro food processing Enterprises (PMFME)
name_hi: प्रधानमंत्री सूक्ष्म खाद्य प्रसंस्करण उद्यम उन्नयन योजना
description_en: Provides 35% credit-linked capital subsidy (max Rs. 10 lakh) to individual micro food processing units for upgradation. Also supports FPOs, SHGs, cooperatives. One District One Product (ODOP) approach. Rs. 10,000 crore scheme over 5 years. Covers 2 lakh micro enterprises.
description_hi: व्यक्तिगत सूक्ष्म खाद्य प्रसंस्करण इकाइयों को उन्नयन के लिए 35% क्रेडिट-लिंक्ड पूंजी सब्सिडी (अधिकतम 10 लाख)। FPOs, SHGs, सहकारी समितियों को भी समर्थन।
benefit_amount: 35% capital subsidy max Rs. 10 lakh per unit
how_to_apply: Apply online at pmfme.mofpi.gov.in. Select product and upload detailed project report. Bank loan sanction is mandatory before subsidy. State Nodal Agency processes application.

name_en: SAMPADA (Scheme for Agro-Marine Processing and Development of Agro Processing Clusters)
name_hi: संपदा योजना (कृषि-समुद्री प्रसंस्करण एवं एग्रो प्रोसेसिंग क्लस्टर विकास)
description_en: Mega food parks, integrated cold chain and value addition, creation/expansion of food processing units, infrastructure for agro-processing clusters. Provides grant of Rs. 10 crore per cluster and 35% subsidy on food processing units (50% for hilly and SC/ST areas).
description_hi: मेगा फूड पार्क, एकीकृत कोल्ड चेन और मूल्य वर्धन, खाद्य प्रसंस्करण इकाइयों का निर्माण/विस्तार। प्रति क्लस्टर 10 करोड़ रुपये अनुदान, 35% सब्सिडी।
benefit_amount: 35-50% grant on food processing infrastructure; Rs. 10 crore per cluster
how_to_apply: Apply through Ministry of Food Processing Industries (MoFPI) portal. Expression of Interest (EoI) required. Evaluation by Project Management Agency.

name_en: Operation Greens - TOP to TOTAL
description_en: Short-term price stabilization measure and agri-logistics support for Tomato, Onion, Potato (TOP) and extended to all Fruits and Vegetables (TOTAL). Provides 50% subsidy on transportation from surplus to deficit areas and 50% on storage charges at cold storages. Farmer FPOs, cooperatives eligible.
description_hi: टमाटर, प्याज, आलू (TOP) और सभी फल-सब्जियों (TOTAL) के लिए अल्पकालिक मूल्य स्थिरीकरण। अधिशेष से कमी वाले क्षेत्रों में परिवहन और कोल्ड स्टोरेज शुल्क पर 50% सब्सिडी।
benefit_amount: 50% subsidy on transport and cold storage charges
how_to_apply: Submit application through NAFED, NCCF or designated agencies. For transport subsidy: submit invoice and quantity proof. For storage: registered cold storage certificate required.

name_en: Agri Clinics and Agri Business Centres (ACABC) Scheme
name_hi: कृषि क्लिनिक और कृषि व्यवसाय केंद्र (ACABC) योजना
description_en: Promotes agro-entrepreneurship by providing training, credit-linked back-ended subsidy and handholding to agriculture graduates to set up Agri Clinics and Agri Business Centres. 44-day free residential training. NABARD provides 36% subsidized loan (44% for women/SC/ST) for startups.
description_hi: कृषि स्नातकों को कृषि क्लिनिक और व्यवसाय केंद्र स्थापित करने के लिए 44 दिन मुफ्त आवासीय प्रशिक्षण। NABARD द्वारा 36% (महिला/SC/ST के लिए 44%) सब्सिडी ऋण।
benefit_amount: 36-44% credit-linked back-ended subsidy + free 45-day training
how_to_apply: Apply through MANAGE (National Institute of Agricultural Extension Management) or SAMETIs (State Agriculture Management and Extension Training Institutes). Online registration at acabc.nic.in.

name_en: National Project on Organic Farming (NPOF)
description_en: Promotes organic farming through establishment of bio-fertilizer and bio-pesticide production units, fruit/vegetable waste compost production units, and capacity building. Provides 25% subsidy on bio-compost units and 100% subsidy on demonstration plots. Certification support through APEDA.
description_hi: जैविक खेती को बढ़ावा देने के लिए जैव-उर्वरक और जैव-कीटनाशक उत्पादन इकाइयां। बायो-कम्पोस्ट इकाइयों पर 25% सब्सिडी और प्रदर्शन भूखंडों पर 100% सब्सिडी।
benefit_amount: 25% subsidy on bio-compost units + 100% subsidy on demonstration plots
how_to_apply: Apply through State Organic Certification Agency or NCOF-approved certifying bodies. For demonstration plots contact Block Agriculture Officer. For certification, apply to APEDA-accredited agencies.

name_en: Sub-Mission on Seed and Planting Material (SMSP)
name_hi: बीज और रोपण सामग्री पर उप-मिशन (SMSP)
description_en: Develops and strengthens the seed production chain from breeder seed to certified seed. Provides financial assistance for Seed Village Programme (50% seed cost subsidy), Private Seed Production (40% subsidy on seed processing), seed storage infrastructure (25% subsidy). Aims to increase seed replacement rate (SRR).
description_hi: प्रजनक बीज से प्रमाणित बीज तक बीज उत्पादन श्रृंखला को विकसित करना। बीज ग्राम कार्यक्रम पर 50% सब्सिडी, निजी बीज उत्पादन पर 40% सब्सिडी।
benefit_amount: 50% subsidy on seed cost in Seed Village Programme
how_to_apply: Apply through State Seed Corporation or District Agriculture Officer. For Seed Village Programme apply through Block Agriculture Office. Seed Certification by State Seed Certification Agency.

name_en: Fisheries and Aquaculture Infrastructure Development Fund (FIDF)
name_hi: मत्स्य पालन और जलीय कृषि अवसंरचना विकास निधि (FIDF)
ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying
description_en: Rs. 7,522 crore fund for fisheries infrastructure development provided through NABARD and NCDC. Provides concessional interest rate loan at 5.16% p.a. for inland fisheries, mariculture, seaweed cultivation, fishing harbours, fish landing centres, cold chain. Repayment period up to 12 years.
description_hi: मत्स्य पालन बुनियादी ढांचे के विकास के लिए 7,522 करोड़ रुपये का कोष। 5.16% प्रति वर्ष की रियायती ब्याज दर पर ऋण। अंतर्देशीय मत्स्य पालन, समुद्री जलीय कृषि, शीत श्रृंखला के लिए।
benefit_amount: Concessional loan at 5.16% p.a. for fisheries infrastructure
how_to_apply: Apply through scheduled commercial banks, cooperative banks, or RRBs with FIDF participation. Submit project report. Bank forwards to NABARD/NCDC for FIDF refinance.

name_en: Pашуdhан Sanjivani (Animal Wellness Programme)
ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying
description_en: Provides free veterinary services, animal health camps, and disease detection for all livestock including cattle, buffalo, sheep, goat, and poultry. Includes free deworming, vaccination against major diseases (FMD, HS, BQ, PPR), free AI services and nasal swab testing. 98,000+ camps organized annually.
description_hi: सभी पशुधन के लिए मुफ्त पशु चिकित्सा सेवाएं, पशु स्वास्थ्य शिविर और रोग जांच। मुफ्त कृमि मुक्ति, FMD, HS, BQ, PPR के खिलाफ मुफ्त टीकाकरण।
benefit_amount: Free veterinary services, free vaccines and deworming
how_to_apply: Contact nearest Veterinary Officer or Livestock Inspector. Animal health camps announced by local Panchayat. Call 1962 (Pashu Helpline) for emergencies.

name_en: National Dairy Development Plan (NDDP)
ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying
description_en: Strengthening dairy cooperative infrastructure and milk processing capacity to double milk processing from 54 lakh MTPD to 108 lakh MTPD. Provides capital grants of 25% (40% for NE/hilly states) for milk processing, chilling infrastructure, quality testing labs, and value-added product units.
description_hi: दूध प्रसंस्करण क्षमता दोगुनी करने के लिए डेयरी सहकारी बुनियादी ढांचे को मजबूत करना। दूध प्रसंस्करण, चिलिंग बुनियादी ढांचे पर 25% (NE/पहाड़ी राज्यों के लिए 40%) पूंजी अनुदान।
benefit_amount: 25-40% capital grant on dairy processing infrastructure
how_to_apply: Apply through State Implementing Agency (SIA) or NDDB. Dairy cooperatives and milk unions are primary beneficiaries. Individual dairy farmers can apply through their cooperative.

name_en: Integrated Pest Management (IPM) Programme
description_en: Promotes environment-friendly pest management through Farmer Field Schools (FFS), biological control agents, bio-pesticides and pheromone traps. Provides subsidized bio-pesticides (50% subsidy), free training in IPM practices, and subsidized pheromone traps. Reduces chemical pesticide use by 50%.
description_hi: किसान पाठशाला, जैव कीटनाशकों और फेरोमोन ट्रैप के माध्यम से पर्यावरण-अनुकूल कीट प्रबंधन। जैव-कीटनाशकों पर 50% सब्सिडी, मुफ्त IPM प्रशिक्षण।
benefit_amount: 50% subsidy on bio-pesticides + free IPM training
how_to_apply: Contact nearest Central Integrated Pest Management Centre (CIPMC) or Block Agriculture Officer. Enroll in Farmer Field School conducted for 15 weeks during crop season.

name_en: Pradhan Mantri Poshan Shakti Nirman (PM POSHAN)
description_en: Formerly Mid-Day Meal Scheme. Provides hot cooked meals to school children and procurement support to farmer groups supplying locally grown vegetables and grains. FPOs/SHGs/farmer groups given priority for school food procurement at MSP or above.
description_hi: पूर्व में मध्याह्न भोजन योजना। स्कूली बच्चों को पका हुआ भोजन और स्थानीय रूप से उगाई गई सब्जियां और अनाज की आपूर्ति करने वाले किसान समूहों को खरीद सहायता।
benefit_amount: Procurement at MSP or above for FPOs supplying school meals
how_to_apply: FPOs and SHGs register through District Education Office or Collector office. Tender process for supply. Priority to local farmer groups.

name_en: National Horticulture Board (NHB) Development Schemes
description_en: NHB capital investment subsidy schemes for commercial horticulture. Covers establishment of orchards, tissue culture banana/potato, cold chain infrastructure, onion storage, and CA chambers. 20-40% back-ended subsidy (max Rs. 50 lakh) on project cost for horticulture investments.
description_hi: व्यावसायिक बागवानी के लिए NHB पूंजी निवेश सब्सिडी। बाग स्थापना, टिशू कल्चर, कोल्ड चेन बुनियादी ढांचे, प्याज भंडारण पर 20-40% बैक-एंड सब्सिडी (अधिकतम 50 लाख)।
benefit_amount: 20-40% back-ended subsidy max Rs. 50 lakh on horticulture project
how_to_apply: Submit project application at NHB Regional Office or online at nhb.gov.in. Bank loan mandatory before subsidy. Post-completion inspection by NHB officer for release.

name_en: Rastriya Krishi Bima Yojana (RKBY) - State Crop Insurance
description_en: Earlier version of crop insurance providing coverage for food crops, oilseeds and horticultural/commercial crops against natural calamities, pests and diseases. Premium: 2% for kharif, 1.5% for rabi, 5% for commercial crops. For states not fully covered under PMFBY.
description_hi: प्राकृतिक आपदाओं, कीटों और बीमारियों के कारण फसल नुकसान के खिलाफ फसल बीमा। खरीफ के लिए 2%, रबी के लिए 1.5% प्रीमियम।
benefit_amount: Crop loss indemnity up to sum insured; premium 1.5-5%
how_to_apply: Apply through nationalized banks at the time of crop loan. Standalone applications at District Agriculture Office. Mandatory for loanee farmers in notified areas.

name_en: National Watershed Development Project for Rainfed Areas (NWDPRA)
name_hi: वर्षाश्रित क्षेत्रों के लिए राष्ट्रीय जलग्रहण विकास परियोजना (NWDPRA)
description_en: Watershed development in rainfed and degraded areas through soil and moisture conservation, land development, drainage improvement, afforestation, and pasture development. Provides 100% central funding for natural resource management. Covers 6.5 million hectares across 25 states.
description_hi: वर्षाश्रित और निम्नीकृत क्षेत्रों में मृदा और नमी संरक्षण, भूमि विकास, वनीकरण और चारागाह विकास। प्राकृतिक संसाधन प्रबंधन के लिए 100% केंद्रीय वित्त पोषण।
benefit_amount: 100% central funding for watershed development works
how_to_apply: Implemented through District Watershed Development Units (DWDUs) under state government. Contact block-level Watershed Development Team (WDT) for inclusion of land in programme.

name_en: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sinchai Yojana - Watershed (PMGSY-Watershed)
description_en: Integrated Watershed Management Programme merging all watershed schemes. Covers soil and water conservation, regeneration of groundwater, prevention of soil erosion, rain water harvesting and management of natural resources. Rs. 12.5 lakh per 500 ha treatment area.
description_hi: सभी जलग्रहण योजनाओं को एकीकृत करने वाला कार्यक्रम। मृदा और जल संरक्षण, भूजल पुनर्जनन, वर्षा जल संचयन। प्रति 500 हेक्टेयर उपचार क्षेत्र 12.5 लाख रुपये।
benefit_amount: Rs. 12.5 lakh per 500 ha watershed treatment
how_to_apply: Watershed Committee at village level identified and supported. Contact District Rural Development Agency (DRDA) or District Collector. Gram Sabha passes resolution for inclusion.

name_en: Technology Mission on Cotton (TMC)
description_en: Improves cotton production, productivity and quality through improved seed production, plant protection, mechanized harvesting, and modernization of ginning mills. Provides 25% subsidy on cotton ginning and processing equipment, 50% subsidy on demonstration plots of improved varieties.
description_hi: उन्नत बीज उत्पादन, पौध संरक्षण और यंत्रीकृत कटाई के माध्यम से कपास उत्पादन में सुधार। कपास जिनिंग उपकरण पर 25% और प्रदर्शन भूखंड पर 50% सब्सिडी।
benefit_amount: 25-50% subsidy on cotton equipment and demonstration
how_to_apply: Apply through State Agriculture Department for Bt Cotton seed subsidy. For ginning mill modernization, apply through Cotton Corporation of India (CCI) or CICR.

name_en: National Mission for Protein Supplements (NMPS)
name_hi: प्रोटीन सप्लीमेंट के लिए राष्ट्रीय मिशन (NMPS)
ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying
description_en: Increases availability of eggs, meat and fish by expanding backyard poultry and aquaculture. Provides 50% subsidy on layer poultry units (2,000 birds), broiler poultry, backyard poultry, fish pond development, and feed mills. 2 lakh new backyard poultry units per year targeted.
description_hi: बैकयार्ड पोल्ट्री और जलीय कृषि के विस्तार से अंडे, मांस और मछली की उपलब्धता बढ़ाना। लेयर पोल्ट्री यूनिट, ब्रॉयलर पोल्ट्री, बैकयार्ड पोल्ट्री पर 50% सब्सिडी।
benefit_amount: 50% subsidy on poultry and aquaculture unit setup
how_to_apply: Apply through State Animal Husbandry Department or District Animal Husbandry Officer. For backyard poultry, apply through Block Animal Husbandry Office.

name_en: Pradhan Mantri SVANidhi (Street Vendors AtmaNirbhar Nidhi)
ministry: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
description_en: Provides micro-credit (Rs. 10,000 / Rs. 20,000 / Rs. 50,000 in three tranches) to street vendors including vegetable/fruit vendors selling agricultural produce. 7% interest subsidy. Digital transactions rewarded. No collateral required.
description_hi: सब्जी/फल विक्रेताओं सहित स्ट्रीट वेंडर को माइक्रो-क्रेडिट (10,000/20,000/50,000 रुपये तीन किश्तों में)। 7% ब्याज सब्सिडी। डिजिटल लेनदेन पर पुरस्कार। कोई संपार्श्विक नहीं।
benefit_amount: Rs. 10,000 to Rs. 50,000 micro-credit with 7% interest subsidy
how_to_apply: Apply online at pmsvanidhi.mohua.gov.in or through lending institutions (Small Finance Banks, MFIs, NBFCs). Letter of Recommendation from Urban Local Body required.

name_en: Atmanirbhar Bharat - Emergency Credit Line Guarantee Scheme (ECLGS) for Agriculture
name_hi: आत्मनिर्भर भारत - कृषि के लिए आपातकालीन क्रेडिट लाइन गारंटी योजना (ECLGS)
description_en: Provides 100% government-backed credit guarantee for collateral-free additional working capital loans to farmers, agri-businesses, food processing, and allied sectors. Loan up to 20% of outstanding credit exposure. 3 years moratorium. No fresh collateral or guarantee required.
description_hi: किसानों, कृषि व्यवसायों और खाद्य प्रसंस्करण क्षेत्रों को बिना संपार्श्विक के अतिरिक्त कार्यशील पूंजी ऋण के लिए 100% सरकारी-समर्थित क्रेडिट गारंटी। बकाया क्रेडिट एक्सपोजर का 20% तक ऋण।
benefit_amount: Collateral-free loan up to 20% of outstanding credit; 100% government guarantee
how_to_apply: Apply through existing banker (nationalized bank, cooperative bank, NBFC). Existing borrower with Rs. 25 crore or less outstanding eligible. Bank provides top-up loan under ECLGS.

name_en: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana - Rabi (PMFBY Rabi)
description_en: Rabi season crop insurance under PMFBY covering wheat, barley, gram, mustard, and lentils. Premium capped at 1.5% of sum insured for farmers. Balance premium paid by Central and State Governments. Mandatory for notified loanee farmers, voluntary for non-loanee.
description_hi: PMFBY के अंतर्गत रबी मौसम फसल बीमा। गेहूं, जौ, चना, सरसों और मसूर के लिए किसानों का प्रीमियम बीमित राशि का 1.5% तक सीमित।
benefit_amount: Crop loss indemnity; farmer premium max 1.5% of sum insured
how_to_apply: Enroll through bank at time of crop loan before rabi cut-off date. Non-loanee farmers apply through CSC, insurance company agents, or bank branches. Enroll before December 31.

name_en: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana - Kharif (PMFBY Kharif)
description_en: Kharif season crop insurance under PMFBY for paddy, cotton, maize, soybean, groundnut, and other kharif crops. Farmer premium capped at 2% of sum insured. Comprehensive risk coverage from sowing to post-harvest. Mid-season adversity and prevented sowing also covered.
description_hi: PMFBY के अंतर्गत खरीफ मौसम फसल बीमा। धान, कपास, मक्का, सोयाबीन, मूंगफली के लिए किसान प्रीमियम बीमित राशि का 2% तक। बुआई से लेकर कटाई बाद तक व्यापक जोखिम कवर।
benefit_amount: Crop loss indemnity; farmer premium max 2% of sum insured
how_to_apply: Enroll through bank at time of crop loan before kharif cut-off date. Non-loanee farmers apply through CSC or insurance agents. Cut-off date typically July 31.

name_en: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyan - Component B (Solar Pump)
name_hi: PM-KUSUM घटक B - व्यक्तिगत सौर पंप स्थापना
ministry: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
description_en: PM-KUSUM Component B: 60% subsidy (30% central + 30% state) to individual farmers for installation of standalone solar water pumping systems up to 7.5 HP. Farmer pays only 10%, 30% bank loan. 20 lakh solar pumps targeted. Replaces diesel pumps for irrigation.
description_hi: PM-KUSUM घटक B: 7.5 HP तक के स्टैंडअलोन सौर जल पंपिंग सिस्टम के लिए व्यक्तिगत किसानों को 60% सब्सिडी (30% केंद्र + 30% राज्य)। किसान केवल 10% भुगतान करता है।
benefit_amount: 60% subsidy (farmer pays only 10%) on solar pump up to 7.5 HP
how_to_apply: Apply through State Renewable Energy Development Agency (SREDA) or State Nodal Agency. Online applications at pmkusum.mnre.gov.in. DISCOM survey required for grid connectivity.

name_en: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture - Soil Health Management (NMSA-SHM)
name_hi: राष्ट्रीय सतत कृषि मिशन - मृदा स्वास्थ्य प्रबंधन
description_en: Provides free Soil Health Cards (SHC) to all 14 crore farmers every 2 years. Soil tested for 12 parameters including NPK, pH, micro-nutrients. Crop-wise fertilizer recommendations given. Also provides 50% subsidy on micro-nutrient application and lime/gypsum for soil correction.
description_hi: सभी 14 करोड़ किसानों को हर 2 वर्ष में मुफ्त मृदा स्वास्थ्य कार्ड। 12 मापदंडों के लिए मिट्टी परीक्षण। 50% सूक्ष्म पोषक तत्व सब्सिडी।
benefit_amount: Free soil testing + 50% subsidy on micro-nutrients
how_to_apply: Contact nearest Soil Testing Laboratory or Block Agriculture Officer. Online soil health card download at soilhealth.dac.gov.in. For micro-nutrient subsidy, apply at District Agriculture Office.

name_en: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana - AIBP (Accelerated Irrigation Benefits Programme)
description_en: Completes on-going major and medium irrigation projects to create additional irrigation potential. Prioritizes 99 projects covering 76.03 lakh hectares. Central grant up to 90% for special category states, 60% for others. Farmer-level benefit: assured irrigation water for Kharif and Rabi crops.
description_hi: चल रहे प्रमुख और मध्यम सिंचाई परियोजनाओं को पूरा करना। 76.03 लाख हेक्टेयर के लिए 99 परियोजनाएं। किसान लाभ: खरीफ और रबी फसलों के लिए सुनिश्चित सिंचाई जल।
benefit_amount: Assured irrigation for up to 76 lakh hectares; reduced irrigation cost
how_to_apply: Farmers in notified command areas automatically benefit from AIBP irrigation projects. Contact Command Area Development Authority (CADA) for water allocation.

name_en: Digital Agriculture Mission - AgriStack
description_en: India's unified digital agricultural ecosystem creating a Farmer Registry (Aadhaar-linked), Crop Sown Registry, and geo-referenced farm unique ID (Bhulekh integration). Enables targeted delivery of all schemes. Provides digital crop advisory, market linkage, and e-KYC for farmers. Rs. 2,817 crore for 2021-2026.
description_hi: भारत का एकीकृत डिजिटल कृषि पारिस्थितिकी तंत्र। आधार-लिंक्ड किसान रजिस्ट्री, फसल बुआई रजिस्ट्री, और भू-संदर्भित फार्म यूनिक ID। सभी योजनाओं की लक्षित डिलीवरी।
benefit_amount: Digital access to all government schemes + free crop advisory
how_to_apply: Register on AgriStack at agristack.gov.in or through CSC. Link Aadhaar with land records. Farmer ID (FID) generated automatically for enrolled farmers.

name_en: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Bhagidari Pragati evam Unnati Yojana (PMKBPUY)
name_hi: प्रधानमंत्री किसान भागीदारी प्रगति एवं उन्नति योजना (PMKBPUY) - Agri Infra
description_en: Incentivizes adoption of best practices across crop calendars, proper input use, crop diversification, and better natural resource management. Provides performance-based cash transfer of Rs. 3,000 per acre to farmers who follow recommended practices as verified by geo-tagged photographs.
description_hi: सर्वोत्तम प्रथाओं को अपनाने के लिए प्रोत्साहन। जियो-टैग किए गए फोटो द्वारा सत्यापित अनुशंसित प्रथाओं का पालन करने वाले किसानों को प्रति एकड़ 3,000 रुपये नकद हस्तांतरण।
benefit_amount: Rs. 3,000 per acre performance-linked cash transfer
how_to_apply: Register through Block Agriculture Officer. Follow recommended crop calendar and practices. Submit geo-tagged crop photographs through the Krishi Bhagidari app for verification.

name_en: National Mission for Silk (Central Silk Board Schemes)
name_hi: राष्ट्रीय रेशम मिशन (केंद्रीय रेशम बोर्ड योजनाएं)
description_en: Promotes sericulture (silk farming) through subsidized mulberry saplings, silkworm seeds, chawki rearing centres, and reeling equipment. Provides Rs. 45,000-75,000 per acre for mulberry plantation, 50% subsidy on reeling machines, and training allowance of Rs. 10,000 per month for new sericulturalists.
description_hi: रेशम पालन को बढ़ावा देना। सब्सिडी पर शहतूत के पौधे, रेशम के कीड़ों के बीज और रीलिंग उपकरण। शहतूत बागान के लिए 45,000-75,000 रुपये प्रति एकड़।
benefit_amount: Rs. 45,000-75,000 per acre for mulberry + 50% subsidy on reeling
how_to_apply: Apply through nearest Central Silk Board Regional Office or State Sericulture Department. Separate schemes for mulberry plantation, silkworm rearing, and reeling/spinning.

name_en: NABARD Tribal Development Fund (TDF)
description_en: NABARD's welfare fund for tribal farmers in Schedule V areas. Covers forest-based livelihood improvement, non-timber forest produce (NTFP) value addition, tribal organic farming, land development, and market linkage for tribal produce. Grant funding up to 90% of project cost.
description_hi: अनुसूची V क्षेत्रों में जनजातीय किसानों के लिए NABARD का कल्याण कोष। वन-आधारित आजीविका, NTFP मूल्य वर्धन, जनजातीय जैविक खेती, भूमि विकास पर 90% तक अनुदान।
benefit_amount: Up to 90% grant for tribal farmer livelihood projects
how_to_apply: Apply through NGOs/VOs working in Schedule V areas or directly to NABARD Regional Office. Project proposal required. Gram Sabha resolution for community-level projects.

name_en: Pradhan Mantri Annadata Aay Sanrakshan Abhiyan - Price Support Scheme (PM-AASHA PSS)
description_en: Government procurement of oilseeds, pulses, and copra at MSP when market prices fall below MSP. NAFED and NCCF are central nodal agencies. No quantity limit for individual farmers. To be registered on PM-AASHA portal before procurement season begins.
description_hi: बाजार मूल्य MSP से नीचे जाने पर सरकारी एजेंसियां तिलहन, दलहन और खोपरा MSP पर खरीदती हैं। NAFED और NCCF केंद्रीय नोडल एजेंसियां। व्यक्तिगत किसानों के लिए कोई मात्रा सीमा नहीं।
benefit_amount: Minimum Support Price (MSP) guaranteed for notified oilseeds/pulses
how_to_apply: Register on PM-AASHA portal before sowing season. Bring produce to designated procurement centres of NAFED/NCCF/State agencies. Payment within 72 hours of procurement.

name_en: Sara Fasal Bima Yojana (SFBY) - Punjab
description_en: Punjab's own state crop insurance scheme covering all crops including vegetables and fruits not covered under PMFBY. Premium 2% for kharif and 1.5% for rabi with additional state subsidy. Compensation within 15 days of crop loss assessment.
description_hi: पंजाब की अपनी राज्य फसल बीमा योजना। PMFBY में शामिल नहीं की गई सब्जियों और फलों सहित सभी फसलों को कवर करती है। खरीफ के लिए 2% और रबी के लिए 1.5% प्रीमियम।
benefit_amount: Crop loss indemnity for all crops at 2% (kharif) and 1.5% (rabi) premium
how_to_apply: Apply through Punjab State Agriculture Department or nearest district agriculture office. Online registration at agripb.gov.in. Deadline for kharif: July 31; for rabi: December 31.

name_en: Mukhyamantri Balak-Balika Protsahan Yojana (Agriculture variant) - Bihar
description_en: Bihar scheme to promote agricultural education. Provides Rs. 10,000 to students from farmer families passing Class 10 and Rs. 25,000 for Class 12 in agriculture stream. Special incentive of Rs. 50,000 for girls from farmer families completing graduation in agriculture.
description_hi: कृषि शिक्षा को बढ़ावा देने के लिए बिहार योजना। किसान परिवारों के कक्षा 10 उत्तीर्ण छात्रों को 10,000 और कृषि धारा में कक्षा 12 के लिए 25,000 रुपये।
benefit_amount: Rs. 10,000 (Class 10) to Rs. 50,000 (graduation) for farmer families
how_to_apply: Apply through Bihar Education Department's DBT portal at edudbt.bih.nic.in. School/college principal forwards application to district DEO.

name_en: Chief Minister Agriculture Production Linked Incentive (CM-APLI) - Gujarat
name_hi: मुख्यमंत्री कृषि उत्पादन संबद्ध प्रोत्साहन - गुजरात
description_en: Gujarat production-linked incentive for increasing agricultural productivity. Provides Rs. 3,000 per acre bonus to farmers achieving above-average yields certified by agriculture department. Special 15% additional bonus for organic certified farmers and farmers adopting zero-budget natural farming.
description_hi: गुजरात में कृषि उत्पादकता बढ़ाने के लिए उत्पादन-संबद्ध प्रोत्साहन। औसत से अधिक उपज प्राप्त करने वाले किसानों को 3,000 रुपये प्रति एकड़ बोनस। जैविक प्रमाणित किसानों को 15% अतिरिक्त बोनस।
benefit_amount: Rs. 3,000 per acre productivity bonus + 15% additional for organic
how_to_apply: Apply through iKhedut portal at ikhedut.gujarat.gov.in. Yield must be certified by field-level Agriculture Officer. Organic certification from accredited agency for organic bonus.

name_en: Pradhan Mantri Jan-Dhan Yojana (PMJDY) - Kisaan RuPay Card
name_hi: प्रधानमंत्री जन-धन योजना - किसान RuPay कार्ड
description_en: Provides zero-balance bank account to all unbanked farmers with free RuPay Debit Card having Rs. 2 lakh accident insurance and Rs. 30,000 life cover. Essential prerequisite for all DBT schemes including PM-KISAN, PMFBY, subsidy transfers. Overdraft facility of Rs. 10,000 after 6 months.
description_hi: बिना बैंक खाते वाले सभी किसानों को शून्य-शेष बैंक खाता। मुफ्त RuPay डेबिट कार्ड जिसमें 2 लाख दुर्घटना बीमा और 30,000 जीवन कवर। 6 महीने बाद 10,000 रुपये ओवरड्राफ्ट।
benefit_amount: Zero-balance account + Rs. 2 lakh accident cover + Rs. 10,000 overdraft
how_to_apply: Visit any nationalized bank branch or Bank Mitra (Business Correspondent) with Aadhaar and photo. Account opens same day. RuPay card issued at branch or through post.

name_en: National Youth Farmers Mission (Naya Kisan)
description_en: Focuses on attracting and retaining youth in agriculture. Provides mentoring, business development services, concessional credit (6% p.a. through NABARD) and startup grants of Rs. 3-5 lakh to agricultural entrepreneurs aged 18-40. Covers precision agriculture, drones, hydroponics, organic farming, and agri-services.
description_hi: कृषि में युवाओं को आकर्षित और बनाए रखने पर केंद्रित। 18-40 वर्ष के कृषि उद्यमियों को NABARD के माध्यम से 6% रियायती ऋण और 3-5 लाख स्टार्टअप अनुदान।
benefit_amount: Rs. 3-5 lakh startup grant + 6% concessional credit
how_to_apply: Apply through NABARD Regional Office or Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVK). Business plan required. Mentoring support provided by MANAGE for 6 months post-setup.

name_en: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana - Har Khet Ko Pani (PMKSY-HKKP)
description_en: Ensures water connectivity to every agricultural field through new water sources, ground water aquifer development, and water distribution network. Provides pump sets, pipe distribution systems, and field channels. Central assistance 60% for general states and 90% for NE and hilly states.
description_hi: हर खेत को पानी पहुंचाना। नए जल स्रोत, भूजल जलभृत विकास और जल वितरण नेटवर्क। पंप सेट, पाइप वितरण और फील्ड चैनल। सामान्य राज्यों के लिए 60% और NE/पहाड़ी राज्यों के लिए 90% केंद्रीय सहायता।
benefit_amount: 60-90% central funding for irrigation connectivity to fields
how_to_apply: Contact local Block Agriculture Office or Irrigation Department for inclusion in PMKSY-HKKP area. District Irrigation Plan (DIP) identifies beneficiary villages.
